content.name: Station Leave
content.description: Lets the Crew of the Skunk Disembark on Platform,s instead of hiding them in the Toilet
content.author: UniTrader

text.name: Station Leave
text.description: Lets the Crew of the Skunk Disembark on Platform,s instead of hiding them in the Toilet
text.author: UniTrader

text.name: Landeurlaub
text.description: Lässt die Crew der Skunk auf Platformen aussteigen anstatt dass sie sich auf der Toilette verstecken
text.author: UniTrader
